title: Prepare TechCorp proposal presentation
description: Create detailed presentation covering technical specifications, implementation timeline, and ROI calculations for Sarah's executive team meeting.

title: Follow up on InnovatePlus pricing discussion
description: Schedule call with Marcus to finalize pricing structure and payment terms. Prepare alternative options based on their feedback.

title: Send StartupVentures competitive analysis
description: Compile comparison document highlighting our advantages over competitors that Emily mentioned. Include customer testimonials from similar companies.

title: Research Global Enterprises requirements
description: Deep dive into their multi-region needs, compliance requirements, and integration capabilities. Prepare technical specification document.

title: Schedule Thompson Consulting onboarding
description: Coordinate with implementation team to begin onboarding process. Set up initial training sessions and data migration planning.

title: Weekly pipeline review meeting
description: Review all active deals with sales team, update probabilities and next steps. Prepare status report for management.

title: Update CRM database with new contacts
description: Add contact information from last week's trade show leads. Verify email addresses and company information.
